description: Ten years ago, the Sawtooth put us on the map in outdoor footwear. The new Sawtooth X retains all the things that made the original so popular with the addition of new aggressive styling and new materials like our Adaptive Cushioning Technology midsole—all you need to map out your next adventure.
name: Oboz Sawtooth X Low - Mens

specs.value: LWG gold certified oiled nubuck, Cordura Fabric mesh, TPU heel counter, 100% RPET Repreve Laces, 100% RPET Repreve Webbing, Micro-injected PU window underlay
Rubber-blended adaptive foam, TPU Shank, Heel puck
